response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly enrich your life or business. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $850,000, aiming to find a mutually beneficial arrangement while ensuring a fair return on my investment.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information to help you make an informed decision.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
